scripts.zip: npm run build && cd .. && zip -r bergall-wp-blocks.zip bergall-wp-blocks -x "bergall-wp-blocks/node_modules/*" "bergall-wp-blocks/src/*" "bergall-wp-blocks/*.git*" "bergall-wp-blocks/*.zip" "bergall-wp-blocks/package.json" "bergall-wp-blocks/package-lock.json" "bergall-wp-blocks/blocks/*" "bergall-wp-blocks/webpack.config.js" "bergall-wp-blocks/.babelrc" "bergall-wp-blocks/.gitignore" "bergall-wp-blocks/.editorconfig" "bergall-wp-blocks/.eslintrc.json" "bergall-wp-blocks/.stylelintignore" "bergall-wp-blocks/.stylelintrc.json" "bergall-wp-blocks/README.md"
